An enhancement of ONScripter, developed by YuriSizuku 

 1. Game Dir 
 use SAF or put game files in app, ext app dir 
 /storage/emulated/0/Android/data/com.yuri.onscripter/files 
 /storage/XXXX-XXXX/0/Android/data/com.yuri.onscripter/files 

 2. Game Setting 
 setting game parameter like `strech fullscreen` 

 3. Game Gesture 
 [long click/3 fingers] to invoke menu 
 [4 fingers] to skip text
